mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (custid, bookid, saleprice, orderdate) SELECT #{custId}, bookid, price, current_date FROM book WHERE bookid = #{bookId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.orderId, A.salePrice, A.orderDate , C.bookId, C.bookName FROM orders A INNER JOIN book C ON A.bookid = C.bookid WHERE A.custid = #{custId} ORDER BY A.orderid DESC
